ComparisonCondition Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The FdoComparisonCondition class derives from FdoSearchCondition and can be used to test the equality of two expressions.


Public Member Functions

 ComparisonCondition (System::IntPtr unmanaged, System::Boolean autoDelete)
